post.body: cuz that's what you is...
you are amazing!
you guys should play the Jesus and Mary Chain song instead, "Happy When It Rains" - a much better song...
the future of music for better or for worse...

following this discussion about whether coldplay infringed on joe satriani's copyright: http://hellotxt.com/l/NQTq
tonight was a night for patriotism - laundry (whites), wine (red) and mood (blue)
on the phone with the bank for ... 36 minutes so far. good times...
i am taking bids for whomever wants to be the next governor of illinois...do i hear $150K????
someone made a video for my radiohead/bjork remix - it's really fun - http://hellotxt.com/l/elwf
really digging the new Michael Franti/Spearhead track "i love you, i love you, i love you" - so simple and yet so good...
i am good enough, i am smart enough and, doggone it, people like me.
vampires are stupid: http://hellotxt.com/l/wfcZ
Wandering around Beverly Hills
another day, another dollar...

Yes - a good friend of mine has worked there for years to get the insurance
thanksgiving, while nice in theory, turns out to be nothing more than eating and sleeping for a few days.
please...no more stuffing...
gonna go "jam" ... hmmm....

cats meow too much...

myspace? check. facebook? check. twitter? check. finally, done with all my social network/lifestreaming maintenance!
keep on with the force don't stop, don't stop 'til you get enough!
share: great article on 2008 music branding buzz - http://hellotxt.com/l/RbL3
sipping a soy latte at the coffee bean & tea leaf in pasadena
trying to circumvent streaming technology
berry festivus!!
thinks that's too much garlic.
very pleased to be living in a non-weather-afflicted part of the country.
can see again! it's a miracle!
reminiscing about old rock band days from the early 90's
BLAGOYAVITZ!!!!!!!
